perturbation.original_text:
Sponsor shall pay Club the Annual Fee for each Contract Year of this Agreement in six (6) equal installments, each
due on or prior to the 1st of each month between June and November of the applicable Contract Year.
perturbation.changed_text:
Sponsor shall pay Club the Annual Fee for each Contract Year of this Agreement in six (6) equal installments, each
due on or prior to the 15th of each month between June and November of the applicable Contract Year.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces an in-text contradiction regarding the payment deadline for the annual fee installments. The original text specifies the 1st of each month, while the modified text states the 15th of each month. This creates ambiguity and uncertainty as to when the payments are actually due.

perturbation.original_text:
Sponsor shall pay the Playoff Payments in
accordance with Section 2(d) of the Terms and Conditions not later than 30 days following Sponsor’s receipt of an invoice requesting payment for
such Playoff Games; provided that Club’s failure to deliver such an invoice shall not, and not be construed to, relieve Sponsor of any obligation to
pay any amount owed to Club.
perturbation.changed_text:
Sponsor shall pay the Playoff Payments in
accordance with Section 2(d) of the Terms and Conditions not later than 15 days following Sponsor’s receipt of an invoice requesting payment for
such Playoff Games; provided that Club’s failure to deliver such an invoice shall not, and not be construed to, relieve Sponsor of any obligation to
pay any amount owed to Club.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces an in-text contradiction regarding the payment deadline for the Playoff Payments. The original text specifies 30 days, while the modified text states 15 days. This creates ambiguity and uncertainty as to when the playoff payments are actually due. This also affects the enforceability.

perturbation.original_text:
If any portion of the Annual Trade Value is not used at the end of the Term, Club shall be permitted to use such
unused amount within twelve (12) months following expiration of this Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text:
If any portion of the Annual Trade Value is not used at the end of the Term, Club shall be permitted to use such
unused amount within six (6) months following expiration of this Agreement.
perturbation.explanation: The original agreement allows the Club to use any remaining Annual Trade Value within 12 months of the agreement's expiration. The modified text shortens this period to 6 months, creating a direct contradiction. This inconsistency could lead to disputes over the Club's ability to utilize the trade value and could affect financial planning.
